#summary ZScreen Features
#labels Featured
<wiki:toc max_depth="2" />

= Screen Capture = 
== Active Window ==
Capture the active window as a screenshot using the default hotkey Alt+PrintScreen
== Crop Shot == 
Capture a region of the screen using the default hotkey Ctrl+PrintScreen
== Entire Screen == 
Capture the entire screen using the default hotkey PrintScreen

= Support for uploading screenshots/images to common Image Hosting Services =
ZScreen can also upload images to your own personal account in these image hosting services.
 * Tinypic
 * Imageshack
 * Other custom places using Custom Uploader 

= Image Editor =
A built-in image editor lets you quickly annotate your screenshots as required. 

[http://i.imgur.com/Qq6dx.png http://i.imgur.com/Qq6dxl.jpg]

= Share screenshots on a Local Area Network = 
Using LocalhostAccounts feature you can host screenshots in a shared folder and share the file URL among work colleagues. 

= Portable = 
See Running ZScreen from a USB Drive under [TipsTricks Tips & Tricks]

= Multiple-monitor support = 
Starting with version 2.6.7.1, ZScreen has complete multi-monitor support. 

= Watermarks =
Watermark tab lets you pick a text or image watermark. 

[http://i.imgur.com/3XBa8.png]

= Simplified Hotkey System = 
[http://i.imgur.com/XyY1T.png]

 * Last Crop hotkey (allows you to redo your last crop shot)
 * Balloon tips, sounds, and ability to show cursor in screenshots
 * Upload images from the File System via Clipboard upload or Drag n Drop

 * Auto-update (via code.google.com)
